title: New free champion rotation: Kindred, Lucian, Sejuani and more!

replies.body: You know it would be nice to play kindred if you hadnt f***ing ruined her by completely gutting her damage and playstyle she is now a useless champ good job riot. she has no damage. But oh go and get the marks to play her. you cant get marks because you cant take any other champions on in a fight because you do no damage, good job ruining my favourite champ >:(
